meanings.definition: The quality or state of being soupy.
meanings.sent1: The soupinesses of the stew made it perfect for a cold day.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the soupinesses of the broth in this restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The soupinesses of the gravy made it look like a delicious lake.
meanings.sent4: The soupinesses of the mud after the rain was like quicksand.
meanings.sent5: The soupinesses of the porridge was so thick, it could be cut with a knife.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having the consistency of soup.
meanings.sent1: The soupinesses of the pudding was unexpected but delightful.
meanings.sent2: The soupinesses of the sauce was just right for dipping.
meanings.sent3: The soupinesses of the paint made the walls look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The soupinesses of the fog enveloped the city in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The soupinesses of the smoothie made it easy to drink through a straw.
